00029 #ifndef ABSTRACTCELLBASEDTESTSUITE_HPP_
00030 #define ABSTRACTCELLBASEDTESTSUITE_HPP_
00031 
00032 #define CXXTEST_ABORT_TEST_ON_FAIL
00033 
00034 #include "SimulationTime.hpp"
00035 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00036 #include "CellPropertyRegistry.hpp"
00037 
00043 class AbstractCellBasedTestSuite : public CxxTest::TestSuite
00044 {
00045 protected:
00046 
00050     void setUp()
00051     {
00052         // The following won't work: it returns from this setup method, but not the test suite
00053         //EXIT_IF_PARALLEL; // defined in PetscTools
00054 
00055         SimulationTime::Instance()->SetStartTime(0.0);
00056         RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->Reseed(0);
00057         CellPropertyRegistry::Instance()->Clear();
00058     }
00059 
00063     void tearDown()
00064     {
00065         SimulationTime::Destroy();
00066         RandomNumberGenerator::Destroy();
00067     }
00068 };
